text.section: This section applies only to criminal history record information recorded before July 1, 1976.
Subject to subsection (c) of this section, a person has a right to inspect and challenge criminal history record information in accordance with this subtitle.

On request by a person to inspect criminal history record information, a criminal justice unit:
shall make a reasonable search for the information; but
need not provide for the inspection of information that is not found after a reasonable search.
